name: insecticidal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
made and used for killing insects, especially those that eat plants or carry diseases: The oil has been shown to possess insecticidal and antifungal properties. They use an insecticidal treatment to destroy wasp's nests.
More examplesFewer examplesInsecticidal soaps will kill aphids, although several applications may be needed.Insecticidal nets should be used where there is a risk of malaria.The virus may be controlled by insecticidal sprays, but these must be applied before the insect carriers first arrive.
